title: Content Marketing Specialist Job at Koins Microfinance Bank Limited
content:
Koins Microfinance Bank Limited is a fully licensed technology and impact-driven microfinance bank that focuses on driving financial inclusion. Loans / Savings / Investments.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Marketing Specialist
Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Content Marketing Specialist is responsible for planning, creating, and optimizing video content that supports the company’s marketing objectives.
	This role involves scripting, shooting, and editing videos for digital platforms, including social media, websites, email campaigns, and online ads.
	The specialist will work closely with the marketing, design, and product teams to craft compelling visual stories that engage audiences, promote brand awareness, and drive conversions.
	Additionally, the role includes analyzing video performance metrics to refine content strategies and ensure maximum impact.


Requirements
Educational Requirements:


	Candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor's Degree in a related field


Technical Skills:


	Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro,Cap cut).
	Knowledge of motion graphics tools (e.g., After Effects).
	Experience with video production equipment (cameras, lighting, sound).
	Familiarity with video formats, codecs, and optimization for different platforms (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.).
	Understanding of SEO for video (e.g., metadata, thumbnails, captions).


Marketing Knowledge:


	Strong grasp of digital marketing fundamentals and trends.
	Ability to align video content with marketing goals and KPIs (engagement, conversion, retention).
	Experience creating content for ads (YouTube, Facebook, TikTok).
	Understanding of customer journey and how video fits into content strategy.
	Basic knowledge of performance analytics and reporting tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, YouTube Studio).


Creative & Communication Skills:


	Strong storytelling skills and ability to create emotionally engaging content.
	Creative direction and scripting ability.
	Excellent written and verbal communication for cross-team collaboration.
	Ability to work with designers, copywriters, and marketers.


Benefits


	13th Month Salary.
	Hybrid work model.
	Leave Allowance.
	HMO.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@koinsbank.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Call Centre Representative Job at Lifted Horizon Nigeria Limited
content:
Lifted Horizon Nigeria Limited - Our client is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Call Centre Representative
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Call Centre Representative will be responsible for handling inbound and outbound calls, addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, providing information about products/services, and ensuring excellent customer satisfaction to drive sales and Marketing team productivity.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Answer incoming customer calls promptly and professionally.
	Make outbound calls for follow-ups, feedback, or sales.
	Resolve customer complaints and provide accurate information.
	Record call details and maintain call logs or Customers Relationship Management)CRM entries.
	Follow communication scripts and company procedures.
	Maintain a positive, empathetic, and professional attitude toward customers.
	Meet personal/team targets for call handling and quality.
	Escalate unresolved issues to appropriate departments/officers.
	Adhere to shift schedules, break times, and daily workflows.
	Any other duties assigned by Management.


Qualifications


	Minimum of SSCE / OND (HND or BSc is a plus)
	4 - 6 years of experience in a customer service or call centre role preferred
	Training in customer relations is an advantage.


Key Skills & Competencies:


	Excellent communication and listening skills.
	Good command of English (and local languages if required).
	Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution abilities.
	Patience and emotional intelligence.
	Attention to detail and accuracy.
	Familiarity with CRM or call centre software (e.g., Zendesk, Freshdesk, Zoho).
	Basic computer literacy (MS Office, typing).


Salary
N150,000 - N300,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@liftedhorizonng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
